definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Objective To analyse function of left ventricle among patients with left-right shunt congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析左向右分流型先天性心脏病左心室功能。

sentences.english: His electrocardiograms (ECGs) recorded during attack showed ventricular tachycardia.
sentences.chinese: 心电图显示为心室频脉。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of nifedipine GITS to prevent left ventricular hypertrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察硝苯地平缓释片预防左心室肥厚的作用。

sentences.english: Echocardiography showed a pericardial cystic mass with external compression of the right ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 心脏超音波显示心脏旁有一水泡状囊肿且压迫右心室。

sentences.english: This cardiac neurohormone is secreted from the ventricles in response to volume expansion and pressure overload.
sentences.chinese: 心脏神经激素分泌量的扩张和压力超负荷心室。

sentences.english: The right ventricle pumps deoxygenated blood to the lung.
sentences.chinese: 右心室将缺氧血液泵往肺部。

sentences.english: The generation of swirling flow in a centrifugal tundish is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究离心中间包离心室旋流发生的方法。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the pharmacological effect of procainamide on transmural ventricular repolarization.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究普鲁卡因胺对心室跨壁复极时间的影响。

sentences.english: RV enlargement and trabecular derangement also were suggested by MRI.
sentences.chinese: MRI也提示右心腔扩大，右心室肌小梁排列紊乱。

sentences.english: The combined contraction of the atria and ventricles is a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 这种心房和心室收缩的结合称为一次心跳。

sentences.english: Congenital ventricular diverticulum is a rare cardiac malformation.
sentences.chinese: 先天性心室憩室是一种少见的心脏畸形。

sentences.english: Subsequent imaging studies demonstrated the presence of the rongeur tip in the left ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 随后的影像学检查证实髓核钳尖端在左心室内。

sentences.english: Ventricular fibrillation can occur in severe hyperkalemia.
sentences.chinese: 在严重高血钾时可以出现心室纤颤。

sentences.english: The right ventricle also may be affected.
sentences.chinese: 而右心室也可能会受到一定影响。

sentences.english: In reconstruction of right ventricle to pulmonary outflow tract, aortic homograft were used in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 右心室肺动脉流出道重建，均用同种带瓣主动脉。

sentences.english: The mathematical expression of ventricular depolarization vector has also been developed from theory of the polarization field.
sentences.chinese: 从极化场出发导出了心室除极向量的数学表达式。
